full_summary:
# Tender Announcement: Professional Audit Support Services (PASS)

[English and French titles]
## PASS SA Stream 1: Internal Audit Services
### AMA SPSV Volet 1 : Services de vérifications internes

[Tender Details]
- **Tender Reference**: PW-23-01027314
- **Announcement Date**: 02/23/2023 
- **Tender Closing Date**: 03/09/2023 at 02:00 AM ET

**Notice Information**
- **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
- **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Selective Tendering
- **Service Area**: National Capital Region (NCR)

**Contract Details**
- **Contract Title**: Professional Audit Support Services (PASS)
- **Contract Period**: Two years firm, with two additional one-year option periods
- **Contract Value**: As and when requested

**Security Requirements**
- **Security Clearance**: Secret clearance is required for the contractor/offeror and their personnel

**Eligible Suppliers**
- Only PASS SA Holders currently holding a PASS SA for Stream 1: Internal Audit Services at the time of the tender closing, in all required resource categories in this solicitation and in the National Capital Region, are eligible to compete.

**Service Description**
- Canada seeks to establish a contract for Internal Audit Services to be provided to Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) under the following Streams: 
  - Stream 1: Internal Audit
  - One Project Manager/Leader
  - Initial Contract Period: from Contract award date to March 31, 2025, inclusive
  - Estimated Level of Effort: up to 80 days per year

**Contact Information**
- **Contact Name**: Fradette, Michelle
- **Contact Email**: michelle.fradette@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Important Note**
- Suppliers who wish to submit a proposal must meet the eligibility requirements and the security clearance requirements.
